title: Execution failed on block=1113035 when trying to launch a new fresh Gnosis node. How to fix it?
body:
What I did:

```
./lighthouse-4.3.0 \
--network gnosis beacon_node \
--datadir=./light_data_new \
--http \
--execution-endpoint http://localhost:55554 \
--execution-jwt ./jwtsecret/jwt.hex \
--checkpoint-sync-url "https://checkpoint.gnosischain.com" \
--port 9001 \
--http-port=5053
```

```
 ./erigon-2.48.0/erigon  \
--chain=gnosis  \
--datadir=./gnosis_datadir_new \
--authrpc.jwtsecret=./jwtsecret/jwt.hex  \
--port 40306 \
--http.port=58548 \
--authrpc.port=55554 \
--torrent.port=42072 \
--private.api.addr=127.0.0.1:59093 \
--http \
--ws \
--http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon
```

What I got:


2. erigon from commit af504f6 & released version lighthouse 4.3.0


**Please help me to fix this error...**
